moves.1. e4 e5 2. Nf3 Nf6 3. Nxe5: i know this is not the best opening but i wanted to see how bad it ended up.
moves.11... Nc6 12. O-O-O Be6 13. d4 Nb4: order of moves are important which i am learning. he should have castled before attempting to take a pawn
moves.14. Qb5+: a type of move i see clearer now. Childs play to better than i players.
moves.14... Bd7 15. Qxb4: up a major piece. the pawn is worth it
moves.15... Qxe3+: lucky me the knight blocks the check. I believe i actually seen that coming before i checked his/her king.
moves.17... Qg5 18. Qa5 b6: i think moving the king b8 was the right move
moves.19... cxb6 20. Qxg5 f6: i think i started to coast after this not making any particularly note worthy moves
moves.21. Qf4 Re8 22. Ba6+ Kd8 23. Rhe1: trying to trade pice for piece.
moves.23... Be7 24. c4 Ba4 25. b3 g5 26. Qf5: to f3 probably would have been better
moves.26... Bd7 27. Qd5 Bc8 28. Rxe7: i decided to clean the board a little loosing the rook now with a possibility to get it back in  few moves.
moves.28... Rxe7 29. Qxd6+ Rd7 30. Qxf6+ Kc7 3: i would have to give the game away now to loose
